top_categories.workout_context: Grassroots Gravel rewards athletes who can hold sustained power without blowing up — threshold is the engine that drives everything above Zone 2.
Over-unders train the lactate clearance you’ll need at Grassroots Gravel when surges push you above threshold and you have to recover while still riding hard.
The G-Spot zone (88–92% FTP) is where you’ll spend the hardest sustained miles of Grassroots Gravel. Make this intensity feel like home.
Grassroots Gravel’s colorado rolling, local event demands rapid power changes — surge over obstacles, settle on smoother sections, repeat for hours.
Grassroots Gravel’s colorado rolling gravel and competitive field demand explosive aerobic capacity — the ability to respond to surges without blowing up.
The varied gradients at Grassroots Gravel reward climbing adaptability — knowing when to sit, when to stand, and when to switch.
Racing Grassroots Gravel isn’t just fitness — it’s pacing, fueling, and executing when conditions deteriorate. This workout practices the race itself.
The Norwegian double-threshold method builds the sustained power base for Grassroots Gravel — massive training stimulus without the recovery cost of VO2max work.
Critical power determines how long you can sustain above-threshold efforts at Grassroots Gravel — a higher CP means more time in the red before failure.
Grassroots Gravel’s colorado rolling gravel drains energy reserves faster than the distance suggests — durability training bridges the gap.
Every session at Grassroots Gravel intensity builds on this aerobic foundation — the endurance base is the soil everything else grows in.
Low-cadence force work builds the muscular strength for Grassroots Gravel’s 4,000ft of climbing — especially the grinding, low-speed ascents.

race_overlay.nutrition: Target 40–60g carbs/hour for Grassroots Gravel’s 60 miles. Front-load calories in the first half. One bottle per hour minimum, more in heat.
race_overlay.altitude: Moderate altitude at Grassroots Gravel. Arrive 2–3 days early. Reduce intensity expectations by 5–10%. Hydrate aggressively.
race_overlay.terrain: Mixed terrain at Grassroots Gravel requires surface adaptability. Include weekly rides on colorado rolling gravel to build confidence. Expect: colorado rolling, local event, mountain west gravel.

pack_summary: This 10-workout pack focuses on TT Threshold, Over Under, and G Spot to prepare you for 60 miles of colorado rolling gravel in Pueblo, Colorado.
